traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
entries: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is {@condition prone}, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.
